named-query.name: BC_READ_CUSTOMER_PAYMENTS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.core.domain.CustomerPayment cp WHERE cp.customer.id = :customerId ORDER BY cp.id

named-query.name: BC_READ_CUSTOMER_PAYMENT_BY_TOKEN
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.core.domain.CustomerPayment cp WHERE cp.paymentToken = :token
